name: Eco-Friendly Bamboo Mug
description: A stylish and sustainable mug made from natural bamboo fibers, perfect for your daily coffee or tea. Dishwasher safe and biodegradable.

name: Artisan Hand-Knit Wool Scarf
description: Luxuriously soft scarf, meticulously hand-knitted from 100% merino wool. Keeps you warm and stylish during colder months.

name: Lavender Bliss Organic Soap Bar
description: Indulge in the calming scent of lavender with this handcrafted soap bar, made from organic, nourishing ingredients. Gentle on all skin types.

name: Smart RGB LED Strip Lights
description: Transform your space with vibrant, customizable lighting. Control via app or voice assistant, perfect for ambient or accent lighting.

name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe Coffee Beans
description: Premium single-origin coffee beans, boasting a delightful citrusy aroma and floral notes. Freshly roasted for optimal flavor and freshness.

name: Eco-Grip Yoga Mat
description: High-performance yoga mat offering superior grip and cushioning. Made from sustainable, non-toxic materials for your mindful practice.

name: Minimalist Ceramic Planter
description: Elegantly designed ceramic planter, perfect for bringing a touch of greenery indoors. Features a drainage hole and saucer.
